definition: to cut one's flesh to cover a sore (idiom); faced with a current crisis, to make it worse by a temporary expedient
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement

sentences.english: It is just like robbing Peter to pay Paul if you try to prepare for the English exam during a maths class.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在數學課上準備英語考試，那好比是挖肉補瘡。
